Docs.summary: Gets or sets the period in milliseconds to refresh the channels statuses.
Docs.remark: Set value 0 to stop the automatically refreshing. Setting the value greater than 0 will start/update auto-refresh.

Docs.summary: Reads the channel status of MPR121 controller.
Docs.remark: Please use ReadChannelStatuses() if you need to read statuses of multiple channels. Using this method several times to read status for several channels can affect the performance.
